name: Mental Math (Quinnful Games)
description: This game will give you random math problems and you will have 60 seconds to solve each problem. You can choose between addition , subtraction, multiplication, and division! Also if you need tips for how to do mental math there is a Tips screen that shows you how to do math faster! Use this game to increase your math capabilities! You will have a "Rank" which is directly tied to how many questions you have answered correctly!
